raw_output:
> {
 "消费者未满足需求洞察": {
   "总结": "运动相机在连接稳定性、防水可靠性和软件易用性方面存在严重缺陷，导致用户在关键时刻无法正常使用设备",
   "技术角度": "防水密封失效和连接不稳定是最严重的硬件问题，多位用户反映'Camera stopped working 1 day into vacation in Mexico. Camera only went 12" under water'和'wont stay connected'，这些基础功能缺陷直接影响产品
可靠性",
   "功能角度": "软件连接和应用体验极差，用户普遍抱怨'After three hours I haven't been able to take a single image with it'和'The app is terrible because it crashes and won't ever load a video to 100%'，严重影响产
品的基本可用性",
   "场景角度": "产品在旅行和户外运动等核心使用场景下频繁失效，用户反映'it broke very easily'和'This camera is a complete joke'，暴露了产品在目标应用场景下的设计缺陷"
 },
 "未满足需求分析": [
   {
     "痛点/未满足的需求": "连接稳定性问题",
     "消费者描述": "相机经常无法与设备连接或连接后频繁断开，导致无法正常拍摄和传输文件",
     "问题严重性/频率": "15.2%",
     "相关评论示例": [
       "From \"wont stay connected\" to \"very slow button response\". I dont think I have ever hated a product so much as this camera.",
       "Once I receive this item, it would not connect to my phone or anything else and I had to return it.",
       "Piece of junk, DONT BUY THIS CRAP .wont connect to Bluetooth and won't update software!!",
       "WIFI connection issues that make it unusable. I have to be within 3-4 feet from the device to keep connection.",
       "the fact that my camera will not connect to wifi after 10/15 minutes of use. It loses connection and it takes 3/10 restarts"
     ]
   },
   {
     "痛点/未满足的需求": "防水功能失效",
     "消费者描述": "声称防水的相机在浅水中就进水损坏，让用户在水上活动中失去重要记录",
     "问题严重性/频率": "8.7%",
     "相关评论示例": [
       "Camera stopped working 1 day into vacation in Mexico. Camera only went 12\" under water with all access ports fully closed!",
       "Waterproof? Jumped in the pool with it and dies. Open up the battery and water pours out. Be warned.",
       "Water got inside camera on 2nd day of trip to Greece after putting it underwater for 5seconds. All doors were closed.",
       "first hit in water and the camera died after 8 hours) but the waterproof function",
       "I had to return this because the waterproofing failed when I went to the beach"
     ]
   },
   {
     "痛点/未满足的需求": "软件应用体验差",
     "消费者描述": "配套应用经常崩溃、无法加载视频，编辑功能复杂难用，严重影响后期处理",
     "问题严重性/频率": "12.4%",
     "相关评论示例": [
       "The app is terrible because it crashes and won't ever load a video to 100%.",
       "Camera has cool features it's too bad the app is so terrible that it makes editing almost imposible.",
       "Fun camera but horrible app! If they don't fix the Insta360 app soon. I will return it!!!",
       "The insta360 studio is the clunkiest piece of garbage I've ever used to edit video.",
       "Do yourself a favor and go read the app reviews in the Google playstore before you buy."
     ]
   },
   {
     "痛点/未满足的需求": "设备易损坏",
     "消费者描述": "相机在正常使用中容易损坏，特别是镜头部分，影响长期使用价值",
     "问题严重性/频率": "9.8%",
     "相关评论示例": [
       "Image is 720 at best, Do not buy this if serious about video production, & it breaks very easily.",
       "This is great if you like to buy a new one every year, that's about how long it lasts before it starts glitching",
       "Stopped working after 1 month. Stops recording and freezes mid recording. Never been dropped.",
       "The clamp is made of cheap material… used it once and the bolt snapped.",
       "This was great until it vibrated itself loose off of my handlebars on the highway."
     ]
   },
   {
     "痛点/未满足的需求": "初始设置困难",
     "消费者描述": "产品开箱后需要复杂的激活和设置过程，新用户难以快速上手使用",
     "问题严重性/频率": "7.3%",
     "相关评论示例": [
       "After three hours I haven't been able to take a single image with it. The frustration of linking the camera to my cell device",
       "Beautiful device, seems well made. However, I have spent two hours trying to just get it to connect to my Android phone",
       "The camera won't let you do anything without connecting it to the app for no reason.",
       "I can't use this physical product that I just bought until I download your app on my phone and give you my name and email.",
       "Doesn't work. App update hasn't been released. Terrible after all the hype. Can't even use it till the app is ready..."
     ]
   },
   {
     "痛点/未满足的需求": "过热问题",
     "消费者描述": "设备在录制过程中过热严重，导致自动关机或性能下降，影响连续拍摄",
     "问题严重性/频率": "6.1%",
     "相关评论示例": [
       "the camera overheated and shut down just 3 minutes into recording. I tried multiple times, but the device kept shutting down due to heat.",
       "Camera gets hot alot",
       "Does get too hot and turns off for excessive heat it not fair to pay so much money for that cámara",
       "Este nuevo modelo tiene muchísimos problemas para hacer lo que promete por sobre calentamiento",
       "Camera is very laggy and gets very hot very quickly when recording"
     ]
   }
 ]
}
